mapper.select: SELECT a.*, e1.Name AS SenderName, e2.Name AS ReceiverName FROM approvals a JOIN employees e1 ON a.Sender_id = e1.Userid JOIN employees e2 ON a.Receiver_id = e2.Userid WHERE a.Receiver_id = #{param1} ORDER BY a.CreatedTime DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT a.*, s.Name AS SenderName, r.Name AS ReceiverName FROM approvals a JOIN employees s ON a.Sender_id = s.Userid JOIN employees r ON a.Receiver_id = r.Userid WHERE a.Sender_id = #{param1} AND a.Approval_status = '진행 중' ORDER BY a.CreatedTime DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT a.*, s.Name AS SenderName, r.Name AS ReceiverName FROM approvals a JOIN employees s ON a.Sender_id = s.Userid JOIN employees r ON a.Receiver_id = r.Userid WHERE a.Sender_id = #{param1} AND (a.Approval_status = '보류' OR a.Approval_status = '거절' OR a.Approval_status = '완료') ORDER BY a.CreatedTime DESC LIMIT 5;
